name: Dungeon Survive
description:
Facing the pack of monsters, use various skills with different characteristics to strike them,
and try to evade their attack.
You can choose a variety of enhanced skill characteristics to determine your play style,
It can be a fireball skill that fires 30 fireballs, and casts 20 flying swords flying in the air,
Or cyclone with the entire screen area,
The game is very difficult, come and challenge your limit!
